title: A Case Study

definitions.LMSI: Language Model Self-Improvement (LMSI) is to improve language models without requiring external supervision, in an unsupervised training manner.

summary: The slide discusses a case study on Language Model Self-Improvement (LMSI), which aims to enhance language models without external supervision. It highlights two notable works: RLCAI and RLAIF, which use different methods to improve AI models.
